attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2023-1087

Date: 2023-10-27

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration, in the amount and on the date indicated in the annexed schedule, of:

 

Beck, Stefanie, former Associate Deputy Minister of National Defence, within the range ($229,900 - $270,400), effective April 1, 2022;

 

Beck, Stefanie, Deputy Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food, within the range ($264,100 - $310,700), effective February 20, 2023 and within the range ($273,500 - $321,700), effective April 1, 2023;
